net.beaconcontroller.topology

Interface ITopology

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TopologyImpl

    public interface ITopology
    Author:
    David Erickson (daviderickson@cs.stanford.edu)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Map<LinkTuple,Long> getLinks()
      Retrieves a map of all known link connections between OpenFlow switches and the last time each link was known to be functioning
      boolean isInternal(SwitchPortTuple idPort)
      Query to determine if the specified switch id and port tuple are connected to another switch or not.

    • Method Detail

      • isInternal

        boolean isInternal(SwitchPortTuple idPort)
        Query to determine if the specified switch id and port tuple are connected to another switch or not. If so, this means the link is passing LLDPs properly between two OpenFlow switches.
        Parameters:
        idPort -
        Returns:

      • getLinks

        Map<LinkTuple,Long> getLinks()
        Retrieves a map of all known link connections between OpenFlow switches and the last time each link was known to be functioning
